title: Heidi Harris: The Consulting Hero
summary: Heidi Harris, a 30-year-old counselor, discovers her ability to see into the future during her counseling sessions and uses it to avert crises throughout the week.
summaryGerman: Heidi Harris, eine 30-jährige Beraterin, entdeckt während ihrer Beratungsgespräche die Fähigkeit, in die Zukunft zu sehen, und verwendet diese, um während der Woche Krisen zu vermeiden.
summaryDutch: Heidi Harris, een 30-jarige counselor, ontdekt haar vermogen om tijdens haar adviesgesprekken in de toekomst te kijken en gebruikt dit om crises gedurende de week af te wenden.
summaryFrench: Heidi Harris, une conseillère de 30 ans, découvre sa capacité à voir l'avenir pendant ses séances de conseil et l'utilise pour éviter des crises tout au long de la semaine.

story.text: Heidi feels an unusual surge of energy during a consulting session, foreseeing a client’s potential business failure. She provides advice that steers the client towards a safer path.
Intrigued by her newfound powers, Heidi faces confusion when she sees a blurry vision involving another client. She decides to ramp up her self-training to control her visions.
Heidi helps a couple reconcile their differences by predicting a significant future event that would affect both of them. They leave her office thankful and more in love than ever.
Facing skepticism from a new client, Heidi predicts a minor but specific event during their session. When it happens minutes later, her credibility skyrockets.
Heidi feels the weight of her abilities; the emotional toll makes her deeply contemplative about the impacts and ethics of her actions.
Rejuvenated by support from friends, Heidi continues to refine her skills, helping community members prevent personal and professional misfortunes.
Reflecting on her week, Heidi feels peaceful, knowing she has made a meaningful difference in people’s lives. She commits to using her powers wisely.

ending: With great power comes great responsibility, and Heidi Harris was ready to embrace both.
moral: Embrace your unique abilities and use them to make a positive impact on those around you.
